mapper.select: SELECT EMP_ID AS empId, NAME AS name, PASSWORD AS password, EMAIL AS email, POSITION AS position, GENDER AS gender, BIRTH AS birth, HIRE_DATE AS hireDate, RETIRE_DATE AS retireDate, PHONE AS phone, STATUS AS status, REMAINS AS remains, DEPT_ID AS deptId FROM employees WHERE EMP_ID=#{empId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEES ( emp_id, name, password, email, position, gender, birth, hire_date, retire_date, phone, status, remains, dept_id ) VALUES ( #{empId}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{position}, #{gender}, #{birth, jdbcType=DATE}, #{hireDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{retireDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{phone}, #{status}, #{remains, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{deptId} )
